globals.specialOfferBody: All new plans include a FREE First Cleanup! We even waive your one-time initial setup fee so you start with a perfect yard, at NO COST! (A $99.99+ Value).

zipView.title: Enter your zip code to see our plans.

sorterView.dogTitle: 2. How many dogs do you have?

paymentPlanView.title: 4. Choose Your Payment Plan & Lock In Savings

checkoutView.title: Final Step: Complete Your Order

riskFreeBox.title: Try Us Risk FREE!
riskFreeBox.body: If you aren't completely happy after your first month of service, let us know and we will make it right or refund your final month's subscription charge. No questions asked.

checkoutView.whatHappensNextBody:
Your payment today covers your first {term} of service. Your subscription will **not** begin until your **first scheduled weekly visit**.

After checkout, a team member will text (or call) you within 24 hours to schedule **two** separate appointments:
1. Your 100% FREE First Cleanup ($99.99+ value).
2. Your First *Paid* Weekly Visit (which starts your subscription).
checkoutView.bailoutLink: Prefer to set up your account over the phone? Click here.

oneTimeView.title: The "One-Time Yard Reset"
oneTimeView.subTitle: For the first 30 minutes
oneTimeView.description: Perfect for first-time cleanups or special events. This price includes 30 minutes of service. Additional time is billed at $1/minute.
oneTimeView.estatePrompt: This service is for properties up to 1/2 acre. For larger properties, please
oneTimeView.psTitle: P.S. Why pay $100 for one day?
oneTimeView.psLinkText: Click here to see our plans!

oneTimeCheckoutView.title: Book Your "One-Time Yard Reset"
oneTimeCheckoutView.whatHappensNextBody:
Your $99.99 deposit is due today to book your service. This covers the first 30 minutes of cleanup.

Additional time ($1/min) will be charged to this card *after* the service is complete. A team member will call you within 24 hours to get your cleanup on the schedule!

customQuoteView.title: You Qualify for a Custom Quote!
customQuoteView.descMultiDog: We love dogs! Properties with 10 or more dogs require a custom kennel service plan. Please provide your info, and we will contact you for a free consultation.
customQuoteView.descEstate: Your property is over 1 acre! This qualifies for our Commercial/Estate contract. Please provide your info, and we will contact you for a free consultation.

specialOfferInfo.title: Free First Cleanup Details
specialOfferInfo.body:
Our Gift To You
We believe in starting fresh! When you subscribe to any recurring plan (Weekly or Twice-Weekly), we perform a complete initial cleanup of your yard absolutely FREE. This service normally costs $99.99 or more.

Why do we do this?
We want to earn your business for the long haul. By waiving the startup fee, we make it easy for you to try our service without a huge upfront cost.

serviceInfo.title: About Seasonal Activation
body:
The Concept: 'Blended Value'
You aren't just buying chemicals; you are buying a Sanitary Yard Subscription. In the summer, your rate covers expensive materials (Sanitizers & Deodorizers) to kill bacteria. In the winter, materials cost zero, but labor doubles (chipping frozen waste, sub-zero temps).

Seasonal Activation
This high-value feature (a $500/yr value) automatically activates from May through October to keep your yard fresh. It is included in your plan to ensure your yard remains safe and sanitary when it matters most.

Consistent Billing
Your monthly rate stays flat because we average these costs over 12 months. This ensures you get the heavy-duty winter service you need without a price hike.

alertsInfo.title: About Our Automated Alerts
alertsInfo.body: We keep you in the loop every step of the way! Our system sends automated text messages for:
bullets: Service Reminders: Sent the night before to confirm your upcoming service.
ETAs: Sent the day of service with a narrowed-down arrival window.
On The Way: A text to let you know our tech is en route.
Service Complete: A final alert (with a photo of your locked gate) once the job is done!

pricingInfo.title: How Billing is Calculated
body: To give you a simple and predictable bill, our monthly plans are based on the total number of visits you'll receive over a full year, averaged into equal payments.
pricingInfo.footer: This is why some months you'll see us 4 times and others 5 (for a weekly plan), but your bill remains the same flat rate.

satisfactionInfo.title: 100% Satisfaction Guaranteed
satisfactionInfo.body: We stand behind our work! If anything is missed, we will dispatch a team to return and make sure any issues are rectified immediately.

exitIntent.title: Leaving So Soon?
exitIntent.body: Before you go, let us email you this quote! We'll also include our Free 5-Point Pet Safety Checklist for Yards.

footer.address: 5625 N GERMAN CHURCH RD. UNIT 2036, INDIANAPOLIS INDIANA 46235
